nodes.text: The Battle of Trenwyth was a battle during the Nagai–Tof conflict of 4 ABY between the Tof Kingdom and the Nagai expeditionary force.

Trenwyth was supposed to be a dead world, but when a large group of Tof suddenly appeared strongly entrenched on the world, the Nagai mounted an attack on their old enemy. The Tof destroyed most of the Nagai force, but there were some survivors, including Wing Leader Taikotelai Akikoma. The battle continued to rage in space. Princess Leia Organa's transport was caught in the crossfire, and forced to make an emergency landing on Trenwyth. There she found an injured Tai and nursed him back to full health, before both parties made their separate ways, leaving the planet in the clutches of the Tof.
